title: How to tell my boyfriend that I can’t be with him if he joins the marines - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, aren’t you a selfish little brat! Dump him BEFORE he goes! You do not deserve a man who would become a US Marine! Do you understand what an honor it is to be accepted into the Marines? Apparently not! He is too good for you!
Do it in the nicest way possible, Marine Breakup Package. Can of dip, box of crayons, 5th of cheap whiskey, Dear John letter, and a bunch of singles for the strip club.
